title: Introduction to Statistics Based on Flipped Learning: Short-Intensive Course Utilizing VR Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Secondary Level), Basic Smartphone Operation Skills
context.additional_context: Implementing a blended learning environment using VR content and mobile apps in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain sampling and probability distributions via VR simulations.
Learners can calculate descriptive statistics (mean, variance, standard deviation) using mobile app-based pre-learning materials.
Learners can interpret the concept of hypothesis testing by applying it to real-world cases through collaborative learning activities.

resources: VR Headset Sharing and Rental System
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
